siteMetadata.title: VPtronics
siteMetadata.description:
VPtronics is ranked as one of the most reliable and trusted supplier
    in Photovoltaic industry as it brings seamless solutions and
    services to its customers. Our range of services include supply of
    equipment and raw-material for solar panel manufacturing, solar PV
    lab set-up that are built with high-end technology to ensure
    future-proof quality in whatever a manufacturer offers forward
